p22: MEMBERS OF THE INSTITUTION
nmc-article: nmc-article
p222: Courses for Members of the institution
p3: This appropriation is intended to subsidise part of the registration fees for language courses or other vocational training seminars attended by Members and alternate Members of the Committee of the Regions as well as the purchase of language self-tuition material in accordance with Regulation (Committee of the Regions) No 003/2005.
